column44: Each submunition deals an additional 1000 damage to armor over 10 seconds. This damage is not reduced by armor.
Hits on hull create massive spalling, dealing exponentially more damage based on the mass of the target.
Hits on shields deal %s damage / second as hard flux.
When impacting shields, a resonator unit activates to increase the base damage by %s.
When impacting shields, a resonator unit activates to increase the base damage by %s.
When impacting shields, a portion of its damage bypasses shielding, dealing up to %s of its damage directly to the target.
Each missile deals an additional %s damage to armor. This damage is not reduced by armor.
Hits on hull create massive spalling, dealing exponentially more damage based on the mass of the target.
When impacting shields, a portion of its damage bypasses shielding, dealing up to %s of its damage directly to the target.
When impacting shields, a resonator unit activates to increase the base damage by %s.
